messages.subject: weekend stuff
messages.msgSnippet: My friends, Since our weekends usually start on fridays around here...we went to Barnes and Noble on friday. We checked out the children s section. WOW! Naomi
messages.messageBody:
My friends,
Since our weekends usually start on fridays around here...we went to Barnes and Noble on friday. We checked out the children's section. WOW! Naomi wanted some workbooks to work in...her choice. So we picked out 5th grade math and a book called science made easy. She also picked up Little women Illustrated classics (my mom had bought her Heidi a couple years ago) and 2 other classics The Wizard of Oz and Peter Pan. She's been enjoying her math book and reading the others.
Saturday..I went to the library while she went with friends out of town to visit their grandma...and picked up 4 books to do with science...a couple of them to use in cooking and edible cooking science projects and the other one was quick science fun you can do in a minute or two. The other book was on Mammoths. She read that one last night and enjoyed it.
ITs still early today, we just got up a bit ago and haven't a clue as to what we will do yet today. I do know that I need to go and make some breakfast soon...Both of us are hungry! I hope you all have a wonderful day..
Jessica
 
Vaughnde Lee
http://www.stampinbookworm.eboard.com
